Analysis:
Analysis:

▪ Average Overtime per capita is generally less than the state. There will be peaks that do not match the state based on being a production facility. The majority of overtime is earned by our production employees. Our production employees represent over 50% of our staff. This also accounts for the % of employees receiving overtime.
